node.title: Weather warning for Wellington and parts of South Island
node.description: MetService is warning of norwest gales and heavy winds for Wellington and parts of Te Waipounamu.
node.content:
["MetService is warning of norwest gales and heavy winds for Te Whanganui a Tara- Wellington and parts of Te Waipounamu- the South Island.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Alexander Robertson\n
", "A series of fronts is moving northeast over southern and central New Zealand tonight, and tomorrow will bring bursts of heavy rain and severe northwesterly gales.", "A strong wind warning is in force for Wairarapa, Wellington and Marlborough - northwest gales could peak at 120 kilometres an hour in exposed places.", "MetService said motorists, especially those driving high-sided vehicles and motorcycles, should be careful.", "In Te Waipounamu, Westland is under a heavy rain warning.", "And a strong wind warning has been issued for the Canterbury High Country, where northwest gales could peak at 120 kilometres an hour and damage trees, powerlines and unsecured structures."]
